alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued June 14 at 3:08AM MDT until June 15 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...West winds gusting 50 to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Judith Gap, Southern Wheatland, Melville Foothills and Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down or damage trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Highway 191 from Big Timber through Judith Gap.
info.instruction: Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Secure loose objects and construction materials. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
